content:
Sure, I can help you create a shift rotation sheet for GM social media agents. Here's an example template that you can customize according to your team's needs:

Shift Rotation Sheet for GM Social Media Agents

|  | Monday | Tuesday | Wednesday | Thursday | Friday | Saturday | Sunday |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| Week 1 | Agent 1 | Agent 2 | Agent 3 | Agent 4 | Agent 5 | Agent 6 | Agent 7 |
| Week 2 | Agent 8 | Agent 9 | Agent 10 | Agent 1 | Agent 2 | Agent 3 | Agent 4 |
| Week 3 | Agent 5 | Agent 6 | Agent 7 | Agent 8 | Agent 9 | Agent 10 | Agent 1 |
| Week 4 | Agent 2 | Agent 3 | Agent 4 | Agent 5 | Agent 6 | Agent 7 | Agent 8 |

Note: You can adjust the number of agents and weeks according to your team's size and rotation schedule.
